name: Monster trader
description:
Made by Tim Dijkstra for the GMTK game jam 2022.

Game can be played in browser or a Windows version is downloadable below.

You are a monster trader, you buy and sell monsters and try to make profit by doing so. However, you have to maintain the monsters that you have bought, while you are waiting to sell them. When monsters collide, they disappear. It is up to you keep them away from each other!

To keep up the pressure, you have to pay coins every time the monster prices change. The amount will increase over time, so you will have to make more and more profit to avoid going bankrupt. Consider the prices, take risks and become the most successful monster trader!

You can post your highscore in the comments below to compete with other players.
